q: Here's some good news: The Nation magazine will publish the Vermont senator's Dec. 10 tirade against extending the Bush-era tax cuts in its entirety this February. The book will be titled, The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. Sen. Bernie Sanders ' speech was not technically a filibuster because it did not hold up any legislative action. But the technicality did not bother Sen. Bernie Sanders ' fans. The independent senator tapped into the outrage on the left

Monday afternoon Senate Democrats sent out a message noting that Ryan's Roadmap has now been endorsed by the House Majority Leader and the top Republicans on both the House and Senate budget committees. Democrats are aware that any proposal to adjust entitlement programs is a politically charged issue for members of both parties-and a shrewd political move is to link entitlement cuts to members of the opposing party.
